alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A HEAVY SNOW SHOWER WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN LITCHFIELD...EASTERN DUTCHESS...EASTERN COLUMBIA...WESTERN COLUMBIA...AND WESTERN DUTCHESS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A heavy snow shower accompanied by winds of up to 35 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 611 PM EDT, a snow squall was over Pine Plains, or 12 miles east of Rhinebeck moving southeast at 20 MPH. THIS SNOW SHOWER WILL BE NEAR... Millerton around 635 PM EDT. Amenia around 640 PM EDT. Sharon around 645 PM EDT. Falls Village around 655 PM EDT. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
